ingredients: 1 lb of broccoli or cauliflower, remove florets and slice into bite-size pieces
steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, saute the onions in olive oil (5-7 min)
Add broccoli and bell pepper. Reduce heat to medium-low and cover. Cook for 8 min
Add the spinach in handfuls and heat until all wilted
Spoon into each enchilada in place of the chicken
title: Enchiladas
